text:
Start jmeter.
Click on the "Root" node in the tree view.
In the console you will see the following exception :

Null pointer: JMeterTreeListener.updateMenuItem()
java.lang.NullPointerException
        at org.apache.jmeter.gui.JMeterMenuBar.setEditAddEnabled
(JMeterMenuBar.java:155)
        at org.apache.jmeter.gui.MainFrame.setEditAddEnabled(MainFrame.java:114)
        at org.apache.jmeter.gui.tree.JMeterTreeListener.updateMainMenu
(JMeterTreeListener.java:366)
        at org.apache.jmeter.gui.tree.JMeterTreeListener.mousePressed
(JMeterTreeListener.java:248)
        at java.awt.AWTEventMulticaster.mousePressed
(AWTEventMulticaster.java:221)
        at java.awt.Component.processMouseEvent(Component.java:3712)
        at java.awt.Component.processEvent(Component.java:3544)
        at java.awt.Container.processEvent(Container.java:1164)
        at java.awt.Component.dispatchEventImpl(Component.java:2593)
        at java.awt.Container.dispatchEventImpl(Container.java:1213)
        at java.awt.Component.dispatchEvent(Component.java:2497)
        at java.awt.LightweightDispatcher.retargetMouseEvent
(Container.java:2451)
        at java.awt.LightweightDispatcher.processMouseEvent(Container.java:2210)
        at java.awt.LightweightDispatcher.dispatchEvent(Container.java:2125)
        at java.awt.Container.dispatchEventImpl(Container.java:1200)
        at java.awt.Window.dispatchEventImpl(Window.java:914)
        at java.awt.Component.dispatchEvent(Component.java:2497)
        at java.awt.EventQueue.dispatchEvent(EventQueue.java:339)
        at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpOneEventForHierarchy
(EventDispatchThread.java:131)
        at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEventsForHierarchy
(EventDispatchThread.java:98)
        at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEvents(EventDispatchThread.java:93)
        at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.run(EventDispatchThread.java:85)

Tested on jmeter1.7beta3
creator: alf@i100.no
jim@boutcher.com
text:
Although I'm not sure why the edit menu object would ever be null (looking at 
the code, that's what this was) --- I put in the checks so you won't receive a 
NPE at this point anymore..

creator: jsalvata@atg.com
text:
Marking all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8's release date as VERIFIED.
Yes, it's pretty poor QA procedure, but there's bugs here lingering since JMeter
1.6, and we need to clean up a little.
Bulk-closing all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8 release date.
creator: jsalvata@atg.com
